channel.title: Comments on: Announcing the new Crypteron Community Edition

item.title: By: Joe Dispenza
item.dc:creator: Joe Dispenza
item.description: Rad!! We were trying to code a solution for this right when I found this for free - you just saved me a ton of time thank you!
item.content:encoded: Rad!! We were trying to code a solution for this right when I found this for free – you just saved me a ton of time thank you!

item.title: By: Jesse Fogarty
item.dc:creator: Jesse Fogarty
item.description: Implementing the CE version myself today. Like most, will likely end off with my suggested route to clients being the paid plans. But, this does provide in my opinion marketing agencies with no excuse when it comes to potentially jeopardizing client data. I can't thank you guys enough in addition to the product for your support in making the internet a more robust, secure form of communication and, community.
item.content:encoded: Implementing the CE version myself today. Like most, will likely end off with my suggested route to clients being the paid plans. But, this does provide in my opinion marketing agencies with no excuse when it comes to potentially jeopardizing client data. I can’t thank you guys enough in addition to the product for your support in making the internet a more robust, secure form of communication and, community.

item.title: By: Melissa
item.dc:creator: Melissa
item.description: Looking forward to trying this with my team! Thanks, Crypteron!
item.content:encoded: Looking forward to trying this with my team! Thanks, Crypteron!
